Class InvertedIndex

java.lang.Object
  InvertedIndex

public class InvertedIndex
extends java.lang.Object

Thread-safe nested TreeMap named invertedIndexMap,which the key is every word in the text files, and the value is another TreeMap which is the specific position of the word.

Author:
yxu66

Method Detail

addRecord

public void addRecord(java.lang.String word,
                      java.lang.String file,
                      java.lang.Integer position)
Add a word with URL and position into invertedIndexMap.

Parameters:
word - words in the html.
file - the URL under the seed URL.
position - the position of the word.
tmpWordMap - a TreeMap to store the word and its position temporarily.

addAll

public void addAll(InvertedIndex subInvertedIndex)
Add the invertedIndexMap of sub InvertedIndex instance into invertedIndexMap.

Parameters:
subInvertedIndex - the given sub InvertedIndex instance

outputToFile

public void outputToFile(java.lang.String outputFilePath)
Output the invertedIndexMap to specific file.

Parameters:
outputFilePath - the path of the output file.
subMap - a TreeMap store the position of words.

search

public java.util.TreeSet<SearchResultFile> search(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> words)
Search specific query word in invertedIndexMap. Return a TreeSet of SearchResultFile instances, which contain the URl where the word occurs, the word frequencies of the URLs and the first position of the word.

Parameters:
words - the query words list.
searchResultHash - a HashMap that the key is URL, and the value is another TreeSet of SearchResultFile instances.
Returns:
searchResultSet a TreeSet of SearchResultFile instances.
